long_description: A budget-conscious helmet for everyday riding and weekend escapes, the Scott Watu Bike Helmet features 16 vents and a lightweight design to keep you comfortable. In-Mold technology binds the shell to the helmet's EPS liner, enhances impact-resistance and creates a lightweight helmet. The user-friendly Rotary Adjustment System (R.A.S.) provides a custom fit for maximum comfort. Easily adjustable chin strap dividers provide maximum comfort and correct positioning of the helmet on your head during use.
short_description: A budget-conscious helmet for everyday riding and weekend escapes, the Scott Watu Bike Helmet features 16 vents and a lightweight design to keep you comfortable.
